thread.section_title: Select Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Boutique Hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely Boutique Hotel - Review of Select Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: SinbadandFirstmate
title: Lovely Boutique Hotel
text:
Stayed in this hotel. Absolutely lovely place to stay.
The receptionist and manager were great.
Gave us an upgrade in room and we were able to go to our room within 1 hour of our arrival at 9am.
Great location for walking to a lot of attractions.
Three good restaurants next door.
Thanks Select Hotel for making our stay so good.
